item.title: Exploring Practice Paths for Cultural Square Empowerment in Rural Revitalization Under the Context of Cultural and Tourism Communication--An Investigation Based on Feng Village, a National Key Rural Tourism Site in Guangxi, China
item.description: This article is entirely my original work, completed independently on January 10, 2024. Kindly respect the intellectual property rights. The full Chinese text, appendices, reference citations, and other related content are available in the accompanying PDF document. tourism_communication.pdf Abstract With the proposition of rural revitalization and the rise of cultural and tourism industries, the demand for rural image construction and dissemination has increasingly become prominent. item.title: Social Spatial Inequality within The Dingfuzhuang Community
item.description: Abstract Through an urban sociological lens, this investigation will delve deeply into the unequal distribution and utilization of social spaces among different areas, neighborhoods, or specific locales within the Dingfuzhuang area of Chaoyang District, Beijing. We aim to identify the concrete manifestations of such inequalities within the particular community, encompassing aspects such as the distribution of infrastructure, allocation of public service facilities, and usage patterns of residential public spaces. item.description: The present article represents a collaborative effort completed by five co-authors, with my contribution focusing specifically on the literature review and data processing sections. item.title: The Cold and Warmth of the Police Station
item.description: Introduction On March 11th, the documentary Guarding Liberation West 3, co-produced by the Changsha Public Security Bureau and Bilibili, came to a successful conclusion, amassing over 200 million views and sparking heated discussions. Throughout the series, it featured both bizarre incidents that left viewers laughing and crying, as well as thrilling on-site arrests, showcasing both the stern and rigorous law enforcement procedures and heartwarming grassroots services.
